description.name: Motocycle stand CROSS ENDURO
description.long_desc:
Wzmacniany stojak / podnośnik motocyklowy dedykowany dla motocykli typu CROSS / ENDURO.

Dodatkowo wzmacniana konstrukcja stojaka gwarantuje stabilne i bezpieczne podnoszenie motocykla.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • najwyższa jakość wykonania
  • stojak umożliwia podniesienie całego motocykla
  • dodatkowo wzmacniana konstrukcja
  • stojak dedykowany do motocykli typu CROSS / ENDURO
  • antypoślizgowa guma na płycie podnośnika

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał: wzmacniana stal malowana proszkowo

Udźwig: 160 kg

Wysokość:240 - 350 mm

Wymiary płyty podnośnika: 230 x 290 mm

description.name: Motorcycle stand 340kg
description.long_desc:
Specifications:

  • adpated to loading capacity - 340 kg
  • pipe diameter - 30 mm
  • pipe thickness - 3 mm
  • weigth ~6 kg
  • solid and easy construction
  • spacing of rocker affixing á- 31 - 37 cm (+/- width of clamp: 5 cm)
  • spacing of wheels - 56 cm
  • heigth while standing - 73 cm
  • heigth while lying - 37 cm

description.name: Motorcycle Lift
description.long_desc:
Motorcycle Lift 450kgá

Motorcycle lift for motorcycles of weigth up to 450 kg.á
It should be used in every professional workshop.á

It makes working easier.
Easy to use and service.á


The lift is made of high-quality material, massively made. The platform is lifted by pumping foot lever. The fluent dropping is possible by pushing the second pedal. The device is equipped with a protection enabling it to drop itself. Simple, durable basis on the base of hydraulic jack.á

Specification:

Loading capacity 450kg
MInimum heigth á175mm
Maximum heigth 750mm
heigth of secure working -2 positions (secured by balk)
Length with approach 2500 mm
Length without approach 1800 mm
Width 660mm
2 turning i 2 stable wheels
foot lever: enabling lifting and droppingá
hyadraulic jack
whole set folded
weigth 120kg
colour: blue
pictures.

description.name: Engine Support Bar 0.5T
description.long_desc: Designed to support front wheel drive engines for repairs or servicing of engine mounts. Engine attachment and adjustment hardware included. Support Arm provides three-point support for off-center loads.
description.short_desc: Designed to support front wheel drive engines for repairs or servicing of engine mounts. Engine attachment and adjustment hardware included. Support Arm provides three-point support for off-center loads.

description.name: 3 legs 10" Bearing puller
description.long_desc:
Ściągacz do łożysk trójramienny 10" typu hobby

3 - ramienna kostrukcja pozwala na równomierne rozłożenie sił ściągających przy wysuwania łożysk, kół zębatych, kół pasowych, kół zamachowych bez uszkodzenia wału.

Dwustronne ramiona umożliwiają ściąganie pierścieni wewnętrznych oraz zewnętrznych osadzonych na różnych głębokościach.

Charakterystyka produktu

  • konstrukcja 3 - ramienna
  • szczęki dwustronne z kutej i hartowanej stali
  • śruba napędowa obsługiwana kluczem 15 mm

Dane techniczne

  • długość ramion: 250 mm
  • długość gwintu śruby: 230 mm

description.long_desc: Puller enables removal of bearings of various types of bodies and housings. Especially recommended for use in ámechanical, electrical and automotive workshops.

description.long_desc:

category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Load Securing

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Load Securing

description.name: Tie-Down Strap J Hook and Plain 6m/5T/50mm
description.long_desc:
Tie down straps are fasteners used to hold down cargo or equipment during transport.


Product Features



  • High quality Polyester webbing

  • Looped one end & J hook on the other end

  • Working load 5000 kg

  • Complies with EN12195-2


Technical Data



  • Strap Length: 6 m

  • Webbing Width: 50 mm

  • Break Strength: 5000 kg

  • Hook(s): Yes

  • Material: 100% Polyester

description.name: Car Transporter Ratchet Tire Straps Trailers Recovery with J Hooks 3m/4T/50mm
description.long_desc:
Wheel Safety Straps are used with all different recovery services for securing the vehicle to the trailer.


Product Features



  • High quality webbing with J hooks and heavy duty wheel grips

  • Polyester webbing, weather-resistant

  • Ratcheting buckle offers a secure attachment

  • Working load 4000 kg

  • Complies with EN12195-2


Technical Data



  • Strap Length: 3 m

  • Webbing Width: 50 mm

  • Break Strength: 4000 kg

  • Fastener Style: Ratchet

  • Hook(s): Yes

  • Material: 100% Polyester
description.short_desc:
